name: Pom-Ai
description:
The casual, idle game where you take care of your 

very own virtual Pom! Play games with your Pom, 

shop for items, and make your Pom the happiest it can be. 

Adopt your favorite Pom.

Make your Pom happy, fed, and clean.

Play Mini-Games with your Pom

Have fun with your Pom and take good care of it! 

This game was for: Dog Gamejam

TEAM: Art: ShainaSenpaii / Code: Roberto J Guajardo  / Code: Abdallah Hemedah / Audio: Janderson Barboza
